node.title: NFL MVP Aaron Rodgers reportedly unvaccinated against COVID-19 despite telling press conference he was 'immunised'
node.alt: Bearded NFL quarterback Aaron Rodgers in gameday kit, wearing a Green Bay Packers cap.
node.description: Green Bay PackersÂ quarterback Aaron Rodgers is missing Sunday's game against Kansas City because of the NFL's COVID-19 protocols, with multiple reports saying he has tested positive and has not been vaccinated.
node.content:
["Reigning NFL MVP Aaron Rodgers will miss Green Bay's next game under\u00a0the NFL's COVID-19 protocol, as accusations fly that he misled his team and the league about his vaccination status.", "Packers coach Matt LaFleur confirmed Rodgers was missing the game against Kansas City on Sunday, but would not say if the superstar quarterback had tested positive or was a close contact of someone who had.", "Vaccinated NFL players who test positive are allowed to return after they have two negative tests at least 24 hours apart. Unvaccinated players who test positive are isolated for at least 10 days.", "NFL Network and ESPN reported Rodgers is unvaccinated despite saying in a press conference in August that he had \"been immunised\".", "\"There's a lot of conversation around it, around the league, and a lot of guys who have made statements and not made statements, owners who have made statements,\" he said.", "\"There are guys that've been vaccinated that have contracted COVID. It's an interesting issue that I think we're going to see played out the entire season.\"", "LaFleur said he was \"not going to get into any of our coaches' or players' vaccination status\" or how long he would be out.", "\"I just know that he won't be available this week,\" LaFleur said.", "LaFleur was asked whether Rodgers's August\u00a026 comment might be seen as misleading to fans if the quarterback was indeed unvaccinated.", "\"That's a great question for Aaron,\" he said.", "\"I'm not going to comment on it.\"", "Per ESPN, Rodgers \"had an alternate treatment\" before the season and petitioned the NFL for that treatment to be considered on par with the league's approved vaccinations. but\u00a0the NFL rejected the request and considered him unvaccinated.", "ESPN also reported Rodgers follows masking protocols while interacting with players and coaches during the week, but he does not wear a mask during his weekly and post-game news conferences.", "The team's back-up quarterback is 2020 first-round draft pick Jordan Love, who has thrown seven passes in his short career.", "Green Bay wide receivers Davante Adams\u00a0and Allen Lazard missed last week's victory at Arizona because of COVID-19 protocols.\u00a0Defensive coordinator Joe Barry tested positive last week and also missed the Cardinals game.", "AP/Reuters", "", "
How to take a rapid antigen test
"]
